title: Dogs rehomed: ‘She went from a defeated dog, to a great pet’
description: For dogs like June, a new home is a lifesaver - but more animals may need new homes post-lockdown.

title: Covid: Teaching post-Covid patients to breathe again
description: A tai chi teacher found he was contacted by patients during the pandemic.

title: How Ben Crump became America's go-to police brutality lawyer
description: When families lose a loved one in a police shooting, more often than not Ben Crump gets a call. Why is he the go-to man?

title: Thomas Tuchel's masterclass leaves Pep Guardiola in despair
description: The story of Chelsea's Champions League showpiece cast both managers as its central characters.

title: Buying a pink NFT cat was a crypto nightmare
description: Trying to own a virtual feline proves to be an exhausting and expensive process.

title: Samantha Azzopardi: Australia's notorious con artist sentenced for child theft
description: Authorities are baffled by the "bizarre crime" of a serial con artist who has travelled the world.

title: Piccadilly 1965: How six Indian friends found their feet in the UK
description: One day in 1965 Praful Patel heard five men talking Gujarati in London's Central YMCA - they quickly became close friends.

title: Holding on to hope during India’s Covid disaster
description: The BBC's Nikita Mandhani reflects on her personal experience of the second wave in India.

title: How opera helped me come out as trans
description: Adrian Angelico is one of the few trans male opera singers in the world.

title: Sasha Johnson: Man, 18, appears in court over activist's shooting
description: Cameron Deriggs, 18, is charged with conspiracy to murder the black equal rights activist.

title: Evans 'not losing sleep' over Thiem comments as Britons prepare for French Open
description: British number one Dan Evans dismisses the suggestion from world number four Dominic Thiem that he is benefiting from the quarantine rules at tournaments.

title: Tetraplegic Steven Webb is elected mayor of Truro
description: Steven Webb was paralysed as a teenager and 30 years later has become mayor of his home city.

title: Ed Sheeran says daughter not his biggest fan
description: Ed Sheeran says his baby daughter "doesn't like anything loud or belty" and cries when he sings.

title: Windermere engagement ring find freediver 'a brilliant man'
description: A couple pay tribute to Angus Hosking, who located their ring after it fell into Windermere.

title: Canada mourns as remains of 215 children found at indigenous school
description: The mass grave was found during a survey of the former residential school for indigenous people.

title: How Fernandinho became a Man City legend - but is this his final farewell?
description: Fernandinho could end his Manchester City career on the highest of highs in this Saturday's Champions League final against Chelsea - if he decides to leave.

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Keep face masks' plan and PM's child jabs decision
description: The papers lead on possible responses to the surge in cases of the Indian coronavirus variant.

title: Watch: Passenger attacks flight attendant in US
description: Incidents of violence or "unruly behaviour" have been on the rise in the US, according to airlines.

title: Biden budget: President sets out $6tn spending plan
description: The proposed budget would bring the US to spending levels not seen since World War Two.
